body.p: Henry Mike everybody know him Indian Saturday he die at Indian Hospital. Henry Mike was pretty old and they tell me 84 years old and when get that old have to die and everybody have to do same thing and can’t go farther and have to die. All people, white man, black man, and Indian all have to die when get old and big strong fellow like prize fighter die too when he get old just same like weak squaw. I don’t know about what people tell about what going to happen after Indian die and every time friend die make me feel pretty bad. Rex Gondrezick is judge now and tell Indian reporter about don’t go hunting prairie chicken and pheasant because he is big fellow and can’t get between trees in woods and stay home and don’t go hunting and just eat tame chicken. Now I want to tell white folks about it make pretty bad for Indians to have to buy license to kill things to eat. Indian been here long time and when he want meat to eat he go out and kill and everything all right and Indians never get hungry and been that way for long time and then white man come over here and take land away from Indians and tell Indians he can’t kill his own game and have to go to white man at court house and buy license and nobody want to hire Indian to work and he don’t have money to buy license for everything like white man want and some time get pretty hungry and Indian want to do same like he used to and kill game when he want meat to eat and don’t have license for everything. Some Indians tell about better give Indians back some land and let them do like they like to live and ten don’t need to have everybody get relief and be better that way. Friday Indian reporter saw geese fly south and that pretty bad sign about winter and maybe get cold now and have to chop wood to keep house warm. .
